oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: About the !kabbi, or partridge, named by |han-kass'o after seeing one in a picture. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The !kabbi: a bird which has white legs and is eaten
